game.name: Cannon Shot
game.description:
Cannon Shot! is yet another highly addictive and engaging arcade challenge that has the ability to keep you engrossed for hours no matter which moment of the day you try it out. This brand new casual mobile game features easy-to-understand concepts and easy controls backed by flawless gameplay and colorful graphics. The aim is pretty simple as you have to shoot your cannon and try to put all the balls inside the bowl to clear each level. Get ready to repeat it until you clear all the levels!

Hey! It sounds easy to handle but is pretty hard to get all those balls directly into the bowl since multiple obstacles will be there to stop you from doing this. Although you have enough balls to achieve your goal, try to use as minimum as possible to score high in the end. Complete your job before you run out of the balls! There are unlimited challenging levels to play through and complexities will keep increasing as you progress in this HTML5 shooter challenge.

You can change the direction of the balls you shoot through the cannon anytime by moving multiple objects shown on the screen. Fill up the bowl with as many balls as possible to complete each level with 3 stars! Be careful and try not to relax since you have to deal with the dangerous boss each time when you complete 10 levels in this fun little physics game! Positioning all the contraptions perfectly will help make your balls bounce their way right towards the bowl. Good luck to aim and perform wisely to unlock many new cannons in this one of the best cannon shooters!
